description:
After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shissou, Meisou, Zigzag-sou! Otte Owarete Machigaete
Zigzag Running! Chasing, Being Chased, Making a Mistake
วิ่งโลด วิ่งแล่น วิ่งซิกแซก ทั้งไล่ทั้งถูกไล่สลับกัน
疾走, 迷走, ジグザグ走! 追って追われて間違えて
